trans-unit.note: Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to add current tab to Bookmarks
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to add current tab to Reading List
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to close the current tab
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to copy the URL of the current tab to clipboard
String describing the action of opening the last added bookmark from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
String describing the action of opening the last tab sent to Firefox from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
Accessibility label, associated to the 3D Touch action on the current tab in the tab tray, used to display a larger preview of the tab.
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to send the current tab to another device
'After 1 hour' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 1 minute' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 5 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 10 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 15 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
Label used as a setting item and title of the following screen to change the current passcode
Title of the dialog used to request the passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Text displayed above the input field when entering a new passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
'Immediately' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app with attempts remaining
Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.target: Raggiunto il limite massimo di tentativi. Riprova tra un’ora.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Raggiunto il limite massimo di tentativi. Riprova più tardi.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.source: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.target: Il nuovo codice deve essere diverso da quello esistente.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user tries to enter the same passcode as their existing code when changing it.
Label for the Passcode item in Settings
Error message displayed to user when their confirming passcode doesn't match the first code.
Text displayed above the input field when confirming a passcode
Text displayed in the 'Interval' section, followed by the current interval setting, e.g. 'Immediately'
Title of the dialog used to set a passcode
Label for the Touch ID/Passcode item in Settings
Label used as a setting item to turn off passcode
Label used as a setting item to turn on passcode
Touch ID prompt subtitle when turning off passcode
List section title for when to use Touch ID

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.target: Usa la tua impronta digitale per utilizzare gli accessi salvati.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing logins

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Private Browsing now.
trans-unit.target: Usa la tua impronta digitale per attivare la navigazione anonima.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing private browsing

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to disable Touch ID.
trans-unit.target: Usa la tua impronta digitale per disattivare Touch ID.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when disabling Touch ID

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access configuring your required passcode interval.
trans-unit.target: Usa la tua impronta digitale per impostare il tempo necessario prima della richiesta del codice.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing the require passcode setting
Action button for deleting bookmarks in the bookmarks panel.
The folder name for the virtual folder that contains all desktop bookmarks.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete it and its contents?
trans-unit.target: Eliminare questa cartella e tutto il suo contenuto?
trans-unit.note: Main body of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
Button label to cancel deletion when the user tried to delete a non-empty folder.
Button label for the button that deletes a folder and all of its children.
Title of the confirmation alert when the user tries to delete a folder that still contains bookmarks and/or folders.
The cancel button when confirming clear history.
The button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: History will be removed from all your connected devices. This cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: La cronologia verrà eliminata da tutti i dispositivi connessi. Non è possibile annullare questa operazione.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.
The confirmation button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.source: Remove history from your Firefox Account?
trans-unit.note: Title of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.target: Verranno eliminati tutti i dati personali, inclusa la cronologia da altri dispositivi sincronizzati.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear all of your data? This will also close all open tabs.
trans-unit.target: Eliminare tutti i dati? Verranno anche chiuse tutte le schede aperte.
trans-unit.note: Message shown in the dialog prompting users if they want to clear everything
Settings item for clearing browsing history
Settings item for clearing the cache
Used as a button label in the dialog to cancel clear private data dialog
Used as a button label in the dialog to Clear private data dialog
Title of the Clear private data dialog.
Button in settings that clears private data for the selected items. Navigation title in settings.
Settings item for clearing cookies

trans-unit.target: Dati non in linea dei siti web
trans-unit.note: Settings item for clearing website data
Settings item for clearing passwords and login data
The cancel button when confirming clear private data.
The button that clears private data.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Verranno eliminati tutti i dati personali. Non è possibile annullare questa operazione.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear their private data.
Shown in error pages for files that can't be shown and need to be downloaded.
Shown in error pages on a button that will try to load the page again
Done button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Share action title Text selection menu item

trans-unit.target: Risultato successivo della ricerca nella pagina
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for next result button in Find in Page Toolbar.

trans-unit.target: Risultato precedente della ricerca nella pagina
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Action button for deleting history entries in the history panel.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Consente di scattare e caricare foto.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: I siti web visitati potrebbero richiedere la posizione corrente.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Consente di registrare e caricare video.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Consente di salvare e caricare foto.

trans-unit.id: Browse multiple Web pages at the same time with tabs.
trans-unit.source: Browse multiple Web pages at the same time with tabs.
trans-unit.target: Apri più pagine web contemporaneamente grazie alle schede.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo
Title for one of the panels in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: Connect Firefox everywhere you use it.
trans-unit.source: Connect Firefox everywhere you use it.
trans-unit.target: Rimani connesso a Firefox ovunque lo utilizzi.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo
Title for one of the panels in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: Easily switch between open pages with tabs.
trans-unit.source: Easily switch between open pages with tabs.
trans-unit.target: Passa facilmente da una pagina aperta all’altra grazie alle schede.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Organize' panel in the First Run tour.
Accessibility label for the image displayed in the 'Sync' panel of the First Run tour.
String spoken by assistive technology (like VoiceOver) stating on which page of the intro wizard we currently are. E.g. Introductory slide 1 of 3
Title for one of the panels in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: Personalize your Firefox just the way you like in Settings.
trans-unit.source: Personalize your Firefox just the way you like in Settings.
trans-unit.target: Personalizza Firefox esattamente come desideri nelle impostazioni.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo

trans-unit.id: Personalize your default search engine and more in Settings.

trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Customize' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for one of the panels in the First Run tour.
See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo
See http://mzl.la/1T8gxwo
Title for one of the panels in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: Tap, hold and move the Firefox icon into your dock for easy access.
trans-unit.source: Tap, hold and move the Firefox icon into your dock for easy access.
trans-unit.target: Tocca l’icona di Firefox, tieni premuto e trascinala sul dock per un accesso più rapido.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Choose' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: The Settings button is at the beginning of the Tabs Tray.
trans-unit.source: The Settings button is at the beginning of the Tabs Tray.
trans-unit.target: Il pulsante impostazioni si trova all’inizio della barra delle schede.
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the Settings button in the tab tray.

trans-unit.id: The Show Tabs button is next to the Address and Search text field and displays the current number of open tabs.
trans-unit.source: The Show Tabs button is next to the Address and Search text field and displays the current number of open tabs.
trans-unit.target: Il pulsante Visualizza schede si trova vicino al campo di testo utilizzato per inserire indirizzi ed effettuare ricerche e visualizza il numero di schede attualmente aperte.
trans-unit.note: Accessibility label for the UI element used to display the number of open tabs, and open the tab tray.

trans-unit.id: Use the share sheet to send links from other apps to Firefox.
trans-unit.source: Use the share sheet to send links from other apps to Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza la condivisione per inviare link a Firefox da altre app.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Share' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.id: Allow Firefox to use my Photos
trans-unit.source: Allow Firefox to use my Photos
trans-unit.target: Consenti a Firefox di accedere alle Foto

Pending feature; currently unused string! Accessibility label for back button to theme chooser
Pending feature; currently unused string! Back button shown to return back to theme settings from photo picker
Pending feature; currently unused string! Accessibility label for settings row to enter theme settings

Pending feature; currently unused string! Sub header for photo options in theme chooser
Pending feature; currently unused string! Button to show preview of selected theme

Pending feature; currently unused string! Button to set selected theme as current theme
Pending feature; currently unused string! Accessibility label for set theme button
Pending feature; currently unused string! Settings row to enter theme settings
Pending feature; currently unused string! sub header for theme options in theme chooser
Button for larger reader font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.
Button for smaller reader font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@.
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %@.
trans-unit.target: Sono stati richiesti un nome utente e una password da %@.
trans-unit.note: Authentication prompt message with no realm. Parameter is the hostname of the site

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@. The site says: %@
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %1$@. The site says: %2$@
trans-unit.target: Sono stati richiesti un nome utente e una password da %1$@. Il sito riporta: %2$@
trans-unit.note: Authentication prompt message with a realm. First parameter is the hostname. Second is the realm string
Button shown to cancel editing of top site.

The title for the Bookmark context menu action for Activity Stream

Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the current page gets added to the Reading List using the Reader View button, e.g. by long-pressing it or by its accessibility custom action.

Setting to enable third-party keyboards
Used as a button label for crash dialog prompt

Accessibility label for the Back button in the tab toolbar.
Block pop-up windows setting

The label for the URL of a bookmark

Alert Call Button
Label for Cancel button

Accessibility hint for the font type buttons in reader mode display settings
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog prompting the user to make sure they want to clear all of their private data.

Context menu item for copying a link URL to the clipboard

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it's already there?
trans-unit.target: Impossibile aggiungere la pagina a Elenco lettura. Forse è già presente?
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the user wanted to add current page to the Reading List and this was not done, likely because it already was in the Reading List, but perhaps also because of real failures.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.target: Impossibile aggiungere la pagina a Elenco lettura.
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after adding current webpage to the Reading List failed.
Error message that is shown in settings when there was a problem loading

Dark theme setting in Reading View settings
Debug option
Debug option
Debug option
Accessibility label for button decreasing font size in display settings of reader mode
Accessibility label for default search engine setting. Title for default search engine picker. Title for default search engine settings section.
Pending feature; currently unused string! Checkbox label shown after multiple alerts are shown
Name for display settings button in reader mode. Display in the meaning of presentation, not monitor.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to save the password on %@?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for saving a password with no username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password for %@ on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password for %1$@ on %2$@?
trans-unit.target: Aggiornare la password salvata per %1$@ su %2$@?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password. The first parameter is the username being saved. The second parameter is the hostname of the site.

trans-unit.id: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.source: Do you want to update the password on %@?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for updating a password with on username. The parameter is the hostname of the site.
Used as a button label for crash dialog prompt
Done button on left side of the Settings view controller title bar Done editing button

trans-unit.id: Double tap and hold to open history
trans-unit.source: Double tap and hold to open history
trans-unit.target: Tocca due volte e tieni premuto per aprire la cronologia
trans-unit.note: Accessibility hint, associated to the Back button in the tab toolbar, used by assistive technology to describe the result of a double tap.
The label of the button the user will press to reject the option to open a file in another application
The label of the button the user will press to be presented with a list of other apps to open a file in

trans-unit.source: Firefox is unable to download or display this file. Would you like to open it in another app?
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile scaricare o visualizzare questo file in Firefox. Aprirlo in un’altra app?
trans-unit.note: The message of the alert box asking the user if they want to use another app to open a file.
The title of the alert box asking the user if they want to use another app to open a file.

trans-unit.source: Downloads aren't supported in Firefox yet.
trans-unit.target: Al momento i download non sono supportati in Firefox.
trans-unit.note: The message displayed to a user when they try and perform the download of an asset that Firefox cannot currently handle.
Text message in the settings table view
Label for button to perform advanced actions on the error page

trans-unit.source: Warning: we can't confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: Attenzione: non è possibile confermare la sicurezza della connessione con questo sito.
trans-unit.note: Warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: It may be a misconfiguration or tampering by an attacker. Proceed if you accept the potential risk.
trans-unit.target: Potrebbe trattarsi di una configurazione errata o di un tentativo di attacco. Procedere solo se consapevoli dei potenziali rischi.
trans-unit.note: Additional warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: The owner of %@ has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore di %@ ha configurato il sito in modo non corretto. Per evitare potenziali furti di informazioni Firefox ha interrotto la connessione.
trans-unit.note: Warning text on the certificate error page
Title on the certificate error page
Label for button to go back from the error page
Button label to temporarily continue to the site from the certificate error page

Menu item in settings used to open input.mozilla.org where people can submit feedback

Button in settings that clears private data for the selected items.
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog prompting the user to make sure they want to clear all of their private data.
Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Button in settings to clear the home page.
Label used as an item in Settings. When touched it will open a dialog to configure the home page and its uses.
Title displayed in header of the setting panel.
Label displayed under the 'Show Homepage Icon In Menu' option. It describes the effect of this setting when disabled.

trans-unit.target: Visualizza icona pagina iniziale nel menu

Placeholder text in the homepage setting when no homepage has been set.
Title of the setting section containing the URL of the current home page.
Button in settings to use the current link on the clipboard as home page.
Button in settings to use the current page as home page.
Button in settings to use the default home page. If no default is set, then this button isn't shown.

trans-unit.id: Swipe right or left with three fingers to close the tab.

trans-unit.id: Sync your tabs, bookmarks, passwords and more.

trans-unit.target: Sincronizza schede, segnalibri, password e altro ancora.

trans-unit.id: Sync your tabs, passwords and more.

trans-unit.target: Sincronizza schede, password e altro ancora.

trans-unit.target: La prima sincronizzazione potrebbe richiedere un po’ di tempo
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the user syncs for the first time
Message displayed when the user's account is syncing with no ellipsis
Message displayed when the user's account is syncing with ellipsis at the end
The Bookmark sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
The Remote Clients sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when synchronization failed to complete
The History sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
The Logins sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed to start.
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed due to being offline

trans-unit.target: Si sono verificati dei problemi con il modulo %@
trans-unit.note: Title for Sync status message when a component of Sync failed to complete, where %@ represents the name of the component, i.e. Sync is experiencing issues syncing Bookmarks
The Tabs sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.
Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.
The button to undo the delete all tabs
The label indicating that all the tabs were closed

trans-unit.id: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.

A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.
The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.
The default name for bookmark folders without titles. The default name for bookmark nodes without titles.
